item.title: Web Design Interfaces
item.description: I have found two great posts on web designinterfaces. The first one deales with 30 essential controlsused in web interfaces. The second one descirbes 15 common componentsused in web user interface design. On designwebinterfaces.comyou can find many more useful posts dealing with web design interfaces.
